description:
Leanan-sidhe, also known as "Spiral Organ", is a very powerful Crimson Denizen who was once an essential part of the war between the Crimson Denizen organization TÃ¶ten Glocke and the Flame Haze Army of the 18th Century. Later, she goes under the guise of Lamies and goes forth on a solitary journey.
Source: shakugan.wikia.com
name: Leanan-sidhe
